machines.name: corporate-ftp
machines.role: Corporate FTP server hosting employee documents and system backups

machines.name: attacker-workstation
machines.role: Penetration tester's machine for FTP exploitation

dependencies: Attacker must discover FTP service through network reconnaissance
FTP access requires credential brute-forcing or anonymous login exploitation
Flag extraction requires decrypting retrieved files using discovered keys

scenario.title: Corporate Data Breach via Legacy FTP
scenario.description: A multinational corporation still uses an old FTP server for internal file transfers. Recent security audits revealed potential vulnerabilities in their file sharing infrastructure. Your mission is to infiltrate their FTP server and retrieve the confidential project specifications.
stages: Network reconnaissance to discover the FTP service and enumerate available services
FTP service exploitation through authentication bypass or credential attacks
File system exploration to locate sensitive documents and encrypted data
Cryptographic analysis to decrypt the final flag from retrieved backup files
